name: SBS-Baratti
description: SER516 Spring 2022 Scrum Board Simulator Project.

memberships.invitation_extra_text: Hey guys this is the Taiga board for the first SER516 team project
Hey guys this is the Taiga board for the first SER516 team project

snapshot.subject: Replace hardcoded values with configurable properties
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to be able to configure different values in the simulation such as start date and end date so I can change the simulation to fit my exact needs.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to be able to configure different values in the simulation such as start date and end date so I can change the simulation to fit my exact needs.

user_stories.subject: Replace hardcoded values with configurable properties
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to configure different values in the simulation such as start date and end date so I can change the simulation to fit my exact needs.

snapshot.subject: Make GUI sounds configurable
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to toggle the GUI sounds on or off so I can turn them off.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to toggle the GUI sounds on or off so I can turn them off.

user_stories.subject: Make GUI sounds configurable
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to toggle the GUI sounds on or off so I can turn them off.

snapshot.subject: Add business value to the simulation
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to add business value to the user stories so I can see how that changes in the simulation.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to add business value to the user stories so I can see how that changes in the simulation.

user_stories.subject: Add business value to the simulation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add business value to the user stories so I can see how that changes in the simulation.

snapshot.subject: Add more user stories
snapshot.description: As a developer, I want to add a larger variety of user stories so the user stories that are randomly generated are more diverse.
snapshot.description_html: As a developer, I want to add a larger variety of user stories so the user stories that are randomly generated are more diverse.

subject: Add more user stories
Add more user story keywords to simulation

user_stories.subject: Add more user story keywords to simulation
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to add a larger variety of user stories so the user stories that are randomly generated are more diverse.

snapshot.subject: Pause the simulation
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to pause the simulation so I can inspect what is happening at any moment in time.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to pause the simulation so I can inspect what is happening at any moment in time.

user_stories.subject: Pause the simulation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to pause the simulation so I can inspect what is happening at any moment in time.

snapshot.subject: Rewind the simulation
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to rewind the simulation so I can inspect the previous state of things.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to rewind the simulation so I can inspect the previous state of things.

user_stories.subject: Rewind the simulation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to rewind the simulation so I can inspect the previous state of things.

snapshot.subject: Switch between "burn down" and "burn up" charts
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to switch the chart between burndown and burnup so I can view progress in a way that makes sense to me.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to switch the chart between burndown and burnup so I can view progress in a way that makes sense to me.

user_stories.subject: Switch between "burn down" and "burn up" charts
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to switch the chart between burndown and burnup so I can view progress in a way that makes sense to me.

snapshot.subject: Add business value chart
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to see a business value chart like the storypoints chart so I can measure progress in terms of BV.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to see a business value chart like the storypoints chart so I can measure progress in terms of BV.

user_stories.subject: Add business value chart
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a business value chart like the storypoints chart so I can measure progress in terms of BV.

snapshot.subject: Log information to logfile
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to output log information to a logfile instead of the console so I can review it later.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to output log information to a logfile instead of the console so I can review it later.

user_stories.subject: Log information to logfile
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to output log information to a logfile instead of the console so I can review it later.

snapshot.subject: Save Taiga API Credentials
snapshot.description: As a Taiga user, I want to be able to save my Taiga credentials to the application so that I don't have to retype my credentials each time.
snapshot.description_html: As a Taiga user, I want to be able to save my Taiga credentials to the application so that I don't have to retype my credentials each time.

history.comment: This is just for the backend work, it doesn't include the user interface part.

user_stories.subject: Save Taiga API Credentials
user_stories.description: As a Taiga user, I want to be able to save my Taiga credentials to the application so that I don't have to retype my credentials each time.

snapshot.subject: Import Taiga project via API
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to enter the URL for a taiga project board and load simulation information from that link so I can simulate a real life project.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to enter the URL for a taiga project board and load simulation information from that link so I can simulate a real life project.

description: As a user, I want to enter the URL for a taiga project board and load simulation information from that link so I can simulate a real life project.
As a developer, I want to be able to access a public project on Taiga via the API.
description_html: As a user, I want to enter the URL for a taiga project board and load simulation information from that link so I can simulate a real life project.
As a developer, I want to be able to access a public project on Taiga via the API.

user_stories.subject: Import Taiga project via API
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to be able to access a public project on Taiga via the API.

snapshot.subject: Store project info from the Taiga API
snapshot.description: As a developer, I want to store relevant information from the Taiga API so I can use it in the future.
snapshot.description_html: As a developer, I want to store relevant information from the Taiga API so I can use it in the future.

user_stories.subject: Store project info from the Taiga API
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to store relevant information from the Taiga API so I can use it in the future.

snapshot.subject: Load simulation using Taiga project
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to load the simulation based on a real project on Taiga so that I can simulate that project.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to load the simulation based on a real project on Taiga so that I can simulate that project.

user_stories.subject: Load simulation using Taiga project
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to load the simulation based on a real project on Taiga so that I can simulate that project.

snapshot.subject: Add incremental step-through simulation feature
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to step through the sprint simulation incrementally so that I can control the progress of the simulation.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to step through the sprint simulation incrementally so that I can control the progress of the simulation.

user_stories.subject: Add incremental step-through simulation feature
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to step through the sprint simulation incrementally so that I can control the progress of the simulation.

snapshot.subject: Fix "doneDay must not be less than startedDay" bug
snapshot.description: As a user, I want to be able to click the start simulation button again after running a simulation without the exception occurring so this bug doesn't exist.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want to be able to click the start simulation button again after running a simulation without the exception occurring so this bug doesn't exist.

user_stories.subject: Fix "doneDay must not be less than startedDay" bug
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to click the start simulation button again after running a simulation without the exception occurring so this bug doesn't exist.

snapshot.subject: Add menu bar to access features
snapshot.description: As a user, I want a menu bar at the top of the simulation so I can access secondary features of the application.
snapshot.description_html: As a user, I want a menu bar at the top of the simulation so I can access secondary features of the application.

user_stories.subject: Add menu bar to access features
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a menu bar at the top of the simulation so I can access secondary features of the application.
